main event: A bright object was observed in the sky over Adona, Arkansas, on 28 August 1956, initially thought to be a star but appeared much larger and gave off rays of light.
interesting points: The object was stationary but later moved slightly to the Southeast,The observation lasted for at least one hour,The sighting was noted to have occurred around 4 AM and persisted until approximately 5 AM,The object was described as much brighter than a star,The witness indicated this was the third similar sighting, although previous sightings did not exhibit the same brightness or rays.
sighted object: a bright object resembling a star
